Text: Once again, thank you for everything. My best wishes go to the Republican candidates up-and-down the ballot in 2022. I know Republicans have the right message this year, and the voters will prove it this November. (Part 4/4)
I am still going to advocate for positive conservative change in our communities so we can get things done for regular people. (Part 3/4)

While the results indicate we fell short, I am as determined as ever to be a voice for hard-working Americans on the Gulf Coast. I ran because I‚Äôm tired of the cycle of career politicians in Austin and D.C. and the inaction they are seemingly content with. (Part 2/4)
